title: Iza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Japanese, Thai, Beer/Wine, Asian, Fusion, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A Pan-Asian dine-in restaurant. As of Jan 2016, menu lists 5 vegan dishes for lunch and 8 vegan dishes for dinner. Menu clearly labels vegan (VG), gluten-free, dairy-free, and vegetarian dishes. Does not use MSG. Happily accommodates vegans, vegetarians, and gluten-free customers.
